Loss of Interest.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by little interest or pleasure in doing things over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.1: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.2: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.3: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks
